import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../../App' import './Message.css' import {format} from 'timeago.js' function Message({message,own,currentchat}) { const {state,dispatch}=useContext(UserContext) const members=currentchat.members return (

{message.text}

{format(message.createdAt)}
) } export default Message
